p: In the hospital setting, we propose application of 0·5% PVP-I solution (0·55 mg/mL available iodine) as gargles onto the oral, oropharyngeal mucosa and as nasal drops onto nasal and nasopharyngeal mucosa of patients with suspected/confirmed COVID-19 and the healthcare workers in close contact with such patients and all routine patients seeking ENT consultation whose COVID 19 status is unknown. Additionally, the application of 0.5% PVP-I can be used for oral surgery, ENT examination and treatment, endo-tracheal intubation, endoscopy and bronchoscopy as a preoperative preparation.
